name: harvester
description: Chrome extension to harvest bookmarked sites from network and reindexing it to allow future filtering and easy search, it has been written with React and Typescript

scripts.watchonly: rimraf dist && npm run extcp && npm run stylepack && webpack --watch --display-error-details
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run extcp && webpack --display-error-details && npm run stylepack
scripts.buildBCKUP: rimraf dist && webpack --mode production && postcss dist/*.css --config afterbuild --replace
scripts.prod: rimraf dist && npm run extcp && webpack --mode production --display-error-details && npm run stylepack
scripts.stylepack: run-for-every-file --src './src' --file '**/*_theme.scss' --run 'sass -I node_modules --no-source-map {{src-file}} | cross-env PRODUCTION=true postcss --verbose -o dist/themes/{{file-name}}.css'
scripts.stylepack-sm: run(){ chokidar 'src/**/*.scss' -c "sass -I node_modules src/$1_theme.scss src/$1_theme.css && postcss src/$1_theme.css -m --verbose -o dist/themes/$1_theme.css"; };run

author: Ivan Sysoev
